channel.title: Nearby Players not being Shown
channel.description:
So, the problem: I'm making a fun PK area, in the middle of the Mage Arena, and when you teleport there you're occasionally unable to see players that are already there; or that come in after you. They can sometimes see you, and attack you, but you're unable to see them.
Is there a method to call to fix this (after the teleport, maybe?), or does anybody know what the problem is?

item.title: Nearby Players not being Shown
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth

I’m making a fun PK area, in the middle of the Mage Arena, and when you teleport there you’re occasionally unable to see players that are already there; or that come in after you. They can sometimes see you, and attack you, but you’re unable to see them.
